CustomField.formula: IF(Total_Electronic_Candidates__c > 0 || Total_Paper_Candidates__c > 0 || Total_SEI_Candidates__c > 0, (Paper_Candidates_Received__c + SEI_Candidates_Received__c + Electronic_Submissions_Complete__c ) / (Total_Electronic_Candidates__c + Total_Paper_Candidates__c + Total_SEI_Candidates__c ), 0)
CustomField.label: Received Percentage
